alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 6:06PM EST until December 20 at 12:51PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Still River at Brookfield. * WHEN...Until early tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 14.0 feet, The river begins to flood roads and parking lots. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 5:45 PM EST Tuesday the stage was 13.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow morning and continue falling to 10.7 feet early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 12.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Still River Brookfield Flood Stage: 12.0 Observed Stage at Tue 5 pm: 13.6 Forecast: Tue 6 pm MSG Wed 12 am 12.7 Wed 6 am 12.1 Wed 12 pm 11.3 Wed 6 pm 10.9 Thu 12 am 10.5 Thu 6 am 10.0 &&
